Posts.Content: Oct 26, 2013 06:59PM Warrior319 wrote: I am not familiar with any doctors in San Francisco area, but I understand the pain. I was in complete discomfort for 6+ months after bi-lateral mastectomy with reconstruction. I highly recommend medical cupping done by massage therapists. It helped me tremendously. The pain and tightness would be so tight it would nearly take my breathe away. There is another procedure along the lines of cupping but cannot remember the name for it.
Posts.Title: Lots of pain tightness months after BMX. PT or massage ideas? carriebee carriebee
